entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
